decryptCypherText(String) - Static method in class ie.gmit.sw.Runner

DecrypterRunnable - Class in ie.gmit.sw
This class implements Runnable and hence is a Runnable, its purpose is to decrypt cypher text using a particular key and add the result to a queue.

Constructor for DecrypterRunnable takes four arguments.

QuadGram - Class in ie.gmit.sw
Basic class with a public constant of int type set to 4.

QuadGramFileParser - Class in ie.gmit.sw
This class is responsible for parsing a text file in the format "SAND 5996705" and placing the two values into a HashMap then returning the Map so it may be used by TextScorer.java in the decrypting process.
QuadGramFileParser(Map<String, Double>) - Constructor for class ie.gmit.sw.QuadGramFileParser
Constructor for QuadGramFileParser takes one argument

A class that implements the Resultable interface and its methods.

Constructor for the Result class takes three arguments
Resultable - Interface in ie.gmit.sw
An interface for all Resultable's that are used in Multithread cyphers.
run() - Method in class ie.gmit.sw.DecrypterRunnable
This method will decrypt the text provided using a railfence cypher then uses the classes built in text scorer to give a score on how English like the text is.
Runner - Class in ie.gmit.sw
This class contains the main method that runs my program and makes use of all the other classes and interfaces shown in this API
